pages.text: Nichiyo Battou!$(br2)Tartaric_Acid, the developer of Touhou Little Maid Mod, who has been devoted so much to Minecraft Mods' localization and game tutorial videos making.

He has made a promotional video for TLS Mod, and also written some text tutorials for SlashBlade Mod. So he deserves a Blade of his own.$(br2)Its texture is requested by him. Now everyone knows he loves Sunny Milk.
